title: Why does Riot spend so much of their resources to rework Ryze and not other champs?
body: So why is Ryze considered but more important to consider for reworks and resource and time when many other champs are just as ruined from reworks or need a rework more? Just think about, everytime Riot couldve reworked another champ other than Ryze, and that alone wouldve made many more interesting champs in game.
